Posts.Content: Wendy, Why wouldn't your oncologist be happy for you? If your "medicine" is working, isn't that the main thing? Thanks.. Kay
Posts.Title: Alternative vs. Conventional

Posts.Content: Yes, there are lots of folks "out there" that have Cancer...but probably not a lot with a pacemaker and a defib.... Don't be discouraged, there are many treatment options....hang in there, do your research....and that is the key to all medical treatments, research...if for no other reason than to make sure that your doctor is telling you the truth!! Ken
Posts.Title: Anyone else out there?
